description: Wavefront Technology Solutions Inc. develops fluid injection technologies for oil and gas well stimulation, and improved/enhanced oil recovery in North America, the Middle East, and internationally. The company offers Powerwave process, an injection technology that improves the flow of fluids in geological materials, including sedimentary soils and fractured rock; and Primawave process, a method for aiding in-ground environmental remediation clean-up in contaminated sites. The company was formerly known as Wavefront Energy and Environmental Services Inc. and changed its name to Wavefront Technology Solutions Inc. in March 2009. Wavefront Technology Solutions is headquartered in Edmonton, Canada.
